attributes.title: Use Your Words
attributes.caption: Four grouchy podcast contributers get together in a battle of wits for the ages.
attributes.description: Barbara, Bethany, Blaine and Gus all sit down to play Use Your Words. Who will be the funniest off the cuff person? Surely Gus won't come in last both times....will he???

attributes.title: Rainbow Six Siege
attributes.caption: The podcast crew battles it's toughest enemy yet.  Xbox Live.  Will they be able to get 5 people in the same room to play together?
attributes.description: Blaine, Burnie, Chris, Gus and Jon test their mettle against strict NAT types and terrorists. They can defeat only one....which will it be?

attributes.title: Mario Kart 8 Deluxe
attributes.caption: Mario Kart.  Friendships will be tested.  Shells will be thrown.  A controller actually gets broken out of rage.  Who will reign supreme and who will beg for mercy before the blue shell?  Find out.
attributes.description: Adam, Cole, Gus and Miles fight technical problems, each other, and a bunch of COM players to determine who will emerge victorious. Someone actually breaks their controller in a rage during this Let's Play, watch the video to find out why!

attributes.title: Think of the Children
attributes.caption: Gus entrusts Brandon and Gavin with guardianship of children...can they successfully take the kids to the park, the beach and the grocery store?
attributes.description: Brandon pretty much screams for the entire Let's Play and refuses to listen to Gus' advice...which is weird because he refuses to use the shout function in the game.

attributes.title: PlayerUnknown's Battlegrounds
attributes.caption: Blaine, Burnie, Gus, and Jon set out with the best intentions to have a fun battle. The betrayal and intrigue they encounter along the way were entirely unexpected.
attributes.description: Blaine, Burnie, Gus, and Jon set out with the best intentions to have a fun battle. The betrayal and intrigue they encounter along the way were entirely unexpected. The whole team is awful. Seriously bad... but one person does stand out as worse than the rest. Try and see if you can figure out who it is. Some of these matches were hosted on our custom server with community members. See if you find your name in the video!

attributes.title: Fortnite
attributes.caption: Blaine, Brandon, Gavin and Gus all enter the world of Fortnite.  Can they overcome their petty differences to build an awesome fort and stave off a horde of husks?
attributes.description:
Thanks to EPIC for sponsoring this video. To pre-order the game, click here: http://www.fortnite.com.





Blaine, Brandon, Gavin and Gus all enter the world of Fortnite.  Can they overcome their petty differences to build an awesome fort and stave off a horde of husks?







Troll Blaine shows his true colors in this video and secretly works to subvert the team's every move. Watch his slow descent into madness as he drags his entire team down with him

attributes.title: Playerunknown's Battlegrounds Take 2
attributes.caption: Blaine, Burnie, Gus and Jon are back to settle a score.  Will they succeed and get a delicious chicken dinner or will their hopes be thrown off a rocky cliff?
attributes.description: Blaine, Burnie, Gus and Jon are back to settle a score.  Will they succeed and get a delicious chicken dinner or will their hopes be thrown off a rocky cliff?We mercilessly pick on Blaine throughout this video. I almost feel bad about it.

attributes.title: Playerunknown's Battlegrounds Let's Play Family Rumble
attributes.caption: Plum Squad represents Rooster Teeth in an all out rumble amongst members of the Let's Play Family.  Time to put our money where our mouth is and show our elite skills to the rest of those chumps.
attributes.description: Plum Squad represents Rooster Teeth in an all out rumble amongst members of the Let's Play Family. Time to put our money where our mouth is and show our elite skills to the rest of those chumps.Let's be honest, you know who is gonna carry the team and who is going to crash vehicles nonstop.
attributes.display_title: Playerunknown's Battlegrounds Let's Play Family Rumble

attributes.title: Plum Squad is Rusty
attributes.caption: Plum Squad suits up to chase an elusive chicken dinner.  They may not have played PUBG as a squad together for some time but surely their skills are still in tact?
attributes.description:
Plum Squad suits up to chase an elusive chicken dinner.  They may not have played PUBG as a squad together for some time but surely their skills are still in tact?
Special thanks to Evan VanWormer for the Plum Squad fan art used in the thumbnail.
